nodes.label: C3 Photosynthesis
nodes.description: Carbon fixation pathway using Rubisco enzyme directly, with temperature-dependent limitations involving Rubisco capacity, RuBP regeneration, and Pi regeneration

nodes.label: C4 Photosynthesis
nodes.description: Carbon fixation pathway with CO2 concentrating mechanism, showing Rubisco limitations below 20°C in chilling-tolerant species

nodes.label: Rubisco Enzyme
nodes.description: Key carbon-fixing enzyme that dominates photosynthetic limitations at low temperatures and low CO2 conditions, particularly below 20°C in C4 plants

nodes.label: Rubisco Activase
nodes.description: Heat-labile regulatory enzyme that becomes a major limitation at elevated temperatures, with stability enhanced through acclimation mechanisms

nodes.label: RuBP Regeneration
nodes.description: Process of regenerating ribulose-1,5-bisphosphate, one of the three main limitations in C3 photosynthesis along with Rubisco capacity and Pi regeneration

nodes.label: Pi Regeneration
nodes.description: Inorganic phosphate regeneration process that becomes a dominant limitation at higher temperatures, enhanced through acclimation in C3 plants

nodes.label: Electron Transport
nodes.description: Photosynthetic electron transport chain that becomes limiting at higher temperatures and is enhanced through acclimation, expected to be more limiting under global warming

nodes.label: Thermal Optimum
nodes.description: Temperature at which photosynthesis is maximized, shifts with growth conditions and can be adjusted through acclimation mechanisms

nodes.label: Cold-Adapted Temperature Range (0-30°C)
nodes.description: Species-specific safe operating temperature range for cold-adapted plants, typically between 0°C and 30°C

nodes.label: Warm-Season Crop Range (7-40°C)
nodes.description: Species-specific safe operating temperature range for warm-season crops, typically between 7°C and 40°C

nodes.label: Tropical/Desert Range (15-45°C)
nodes.description: Species-specific safe operating temperature range for tropical or desert species, typically between 15°C and 45°C

nodes.label: Temperature Acclimation
nodes.description: Adaptive process that adjusts thermal optimum and enhances assimilation rates, with different mechanisms in C3 and C4 plants

nodes.label: C4 Cycle Enzymes
nodes.description: Enzymes involved in C4 carbon fixation pathway that are increased in C4 plants from warm habitats when acclimating to cooler conditions

nodes.label: Low CO2 Conditions
nodes.description: Environmental condition where Rubisco capacity dominates photosynthetic limitations across various temperatures in C3 plants

nodes.label: High CO2 Conditions
nodes.description: Environmental condition expected under global change that will shift limitations toward electron transport and Rubisco activase constraints

nodes.label: Global Warming
nodes.description: Climate change factor expected to shift photosynthetic limitations toward electron transport and Rubisco activase constraints under warmer, high CO2 conditions

nodes.label: Chilling Tolerance
nodes.description: Plant characteristic that determines sensitivity to low temperatures, with chilling-tolerant C4 species showing Rubisco limitations below 20°C

nodes.label: Photosynthetic Efficiency
nodes.description: Overall measure of photosynthetic performance that is affected by temperature limitations and expected to decline under future thermal environments
